Text.Page:
It's all well and good to slaughter the Red Lash here in the grotto, but we have to make sure they can't take to the high seas, too.

Most of the Red Lash fleet is in for repairs, so our timing couldn't be better.

{@LinkCreature:11#3003#Red Lash injenirs} do most of the repair work. Kill them and steal their tools.
Good luck repairing a hull with no tools and no workers. Can't call yourselves pirates if you never leave the dock!
It's the {@LinkCreature:11#3003#Red Lash injenirs}. Without them, those pirate ships will never leave the docks.
